entry.title: neuherbs Omega Peanut Butter All Natural
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Peanut Butter
Price: 215.00

neuherbs Omega Peanut Butter All Natural offers you the goodness of real peanut butter with Omega-3. It has no added preservatives or sugar, which makes it one of the healthiest peanut butter even for vegans. Taste the natural crunch of peanuts with this Crunchy Peanut Butter that can help you lead a healthy lifestyle and achieve health goals.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits of Natural Peanut Butter —

  • Natural Peanut Butter For Weight Management

    Peanuts are low in carbs and high in fiber helps provide a feeling of fullness. This low sugar nutty peanut butter can assist you in managing weight

  • Natural Peanut Butter For Muscle Building

    Peanut butter is a rich source of protein, which is essential for building, repairing & recovering muscles after the workout.

  • Natural Peanut Butter For Heart

    Peanut butter is naturally low in saturated fat & enriched with PUFA & MUFA, with added omega-3, this peanut butter can be helpful for your heart.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Roasted Peanuts

    To deliver the natural taste & benefits of peanuts

  • Omega-3 From Flaxseeds

    To deliver daily essential fats

  • Crunchy Peanut Chunks

    To deliver a nutty, crunchy touch of real peanuts

— How To Use —

  • As Breakfast

    With bread or in oatmeal

  • As Mid-Day Snack

    With fruits or celery to fulfill daily protein needs

  • As Pre/Post Workout Meal

    Add in protein shakes or smoothies

  • I want to do muscle building, can I use it?

    Yes, you can use it with your shakes or smoothies pre/post-workout.

  • Is it made from raw peanuts?

    No, neuherbs All Natural Peanut Butter is made from roasted peanuts for a better taste

  • Does it contain hydrogenated fats?

    No, neuherbs All Natural Peanut Butter doesn't contain hydrogenated fats, trans fat, or cholesterol.

  • Does oil separation take place in this?

    yes, as it is a natural peanut butter oil separation takes place in it as a natural process.

  • How much added sugar does it contain?

    neuherbs All Natural Peanut Butter is completely natural and doesn't contain added sugar or salt.

  • Does it contain Omega-3 from a non-veg source?

    No, neuherbs All Natural Peanut Butter contains omega-3 from flax seeds that is why it can be useful for vegans.

  • Does it come in a 1 kg pack?

    No, neuherbs All Natural Peanut Butter is available in 400 g packaging.

neuherbs Omega Peanut Butter Dark Chocolate Creamy with added Omega-3, made with the finest quality roasted peanuts & Dark Chocolate. A mouthwatering nutritious combination.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

  • Peanut Butter For Energy Boost

    Provides you the richness of protein for an instant energy boost

  • Peanut Butter For Heart

    This Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter naturally contains PUFA & MUFA. And has added natural omega-3 from flaxseeds along with dark chocolate, which is good for heart health & tasty too.

  • Peanut Butter For delicious snacking

    This delicious Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter can be a healthy version of regular butter along with its dark chocolate taste that satisfies your taste buds.

  • Omega-3 From Flaxseeds

    Add it in cakes, cookies & bread batter

    With bread or in oatmeal & shakes

  • Can I use it as a healthy meal?

    Yes, you can use it as a healthy meal in your bread toast, fruits, celery, Shakes, and Smoothies

  • Is it made from raw peanuts?

    No, neuherbs Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter is made from roasted peanuts for a better taste

  • Does oil separation take place in this?

    No, oil separation does not take place in this dark chocolate peanut butter.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    neuherbs Peanut Butter with dark chocolate is best 12 months from the date of manufacture.
